price: Wͻn mmienu tuu mmirika baa pono no ho, na ͻbaa no tee Yosef ataade-soroͻ mu wͻ n’akyi. Na wͻn mmienu hunuu ͻbaa no wura (okunu) wͻ ͻpono no ano. Ɔbaa no kaa sε: “Ɛdeεn akatua na εfata obi a ͻpεsε ͻde wo yere fa kwan bͻne soͻ? Sε afiase anaa asotwee a εyε ya paa (na εfata no)?”
arabic: وَٱسۡتَبَقَا ٱلۡبَابَ وَقَدَّتۡ قَمِيصَهُۥ مِن دُبُرٖ وَأَلۡفَيَا سَيِّدَهَا لَدَا ٱلۡبَابِۚ قَالَتۡ مَا جَزَآءُ مَنۡ أَرَادَ بِأَهۡلِكَ سُوٓءًا إِلَّآ أَن يُسۡجَنَ أَوۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tabaqā al-bāba waqaddat qamīṣahu min duburin wa-alfayā sayyidahā ladā al-bābi qālat mā jazāu man arāda bi-ahlika sūan illā an yus'jana aw ʿadhābun alīmun
